services.latex
Class LatexManager.SetLatexUpdater

java.lang.Object
  services.latex.LatexManager.SetLatexUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
LatexManager
private static class LatexManager.SetLatexUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A Runnable that updates the LaTeX redering settings. This is needed since the LatexPrerenderer displays its progress; thus the updating cannot be done inside the Swing event loop.

Author:
Lenko Grigorov
See Also:
LatexManager.setLatexEnabled(boolean), LatexManager.setLatexEnabledFromMenu(boolean)

          The setting that has to be effected.

Field Detail

setting

private boolean setting
The setting that has to be effected. true to enable LaTeX rendering; false otherwise.
